dct_title_s: Plan of the city of Victoria, Hong Kong
dct_description_sm: Drawn and Engraved for the Directory & Chronicle ; John Bartholomew & Co., Edinr.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Inset map showing waterway from Causeway Bay to Mint Dam.
Shows roads, railways, block numbers, various locations (temples, recreation grounds, batteries, etc.), waterways, ethnic cemeteries, vegetation, proposed harbor extensions.
Map removed from "Directory & Chronicle," likely 1903 edition.
